name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>
display action

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

else

camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

end

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
 move user: targets, front, 20
else
 perform start
end


wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation

action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5

</target action>

Jump Smash
note:
<Cooldown:4>
<Learn Cost: 80 JP>

<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
wait: 60
opacity not focus: 0%
wait: 15
</setup action>

<target action>
perform start
jump user: 110%, 15
move user: targets, back base, 15
motion swing: user
motion wait: user
action animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
wait: 10
immortal: targets, false
death break
perform finish
wait: 25
opacity not focus: 100%
clear battle log
</target action>

<follow action>
</follow action>

description: Biting enemies will raise up to Magic Attack for 5 turns
name: Bite

description: Restores STM to one ally.
name: Angel's Touch
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
wait: 40
hide battle hud
opacity not focus: 0%
wait: 15
motion chant: user
motion wait: user
</setup action>

<Target Action>
motion spell: user
motion wait: user
wait: 30
action animation: target
wait for animation
if user.isStateAffected(19)
action effect: target
ADD STATE 20: target, show
else
action effect: target
end
death break
clear battle log
wait: 20
perform finish
opacity not focus: 100%
wait: 20
</Target Action>

<follow action>
show battle hud
</follow action>

name: Wind Blast

wait: 7
wait for animation
MOTION spell: user
wait: 15

wait: 10
immortal: targets, false
